alert.note: Alert for Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:35PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Morrison... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 834 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding in the area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Little Falls, Pierz, Royalton, Randall, Lastrup, Camp Ripley, Morrill, Buckman, Sobieski, Harding, Genola and Camp Ripley Junction.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
